${model.app.performRepositoryAction(model,getStringParameter("repositoryName"),"repositoryReindex")} <#if !model.app.isRepositoryAvaliable(model)> Ok ${model.setSession(null)} <#stop "repository closed for admin purpose, ignore exceptions from this request"> <@page_overview_title/>
<#if status??> ${status}
<#else> Repository rebuild index successfully
Ok
